summary: 1986  was a common year starting on Wednesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1986  was a common year starting on Wednesday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1986th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 986th year of the 2nd millennium, the 86th year of the 20th century, and the 7th year of the 1980s decade. The year 1986 was designated as the International Year of Peace by the United Nations.
